name: home
story: Someone's a lil too comfortable! Don't worry, you are at home!!!
nav:
Press
1) to go to school
2) to go to work
3) to go see your granny

name: school
story: Hello! Welcome to school!!
nav:
Press 
1) to go home
2) to go the library
3) for a party

name: library
story: You are at the library, get those big brains plugged in and working!
nav:
Press 
1) to go back to class
2) to go home
3) to go to the gym

name: work
story: You are at work,try not to steal your co-worker's lunch
nav:
Press 
1) to head to the gym
2) to visit a friend
3) to have lunch

name: grandparent's house
story: It's the weekend, you are at granny's , time for some crosswords!
nav:
Press 
1) to go home
2) to go to the vet
3) to go the beach

name: gym
story: Welcome to the gym,you don't need to be extreme, you just need consistency!
nav:
Press 
1) to go home
2) to go have a healthy lunch
3) to go to the grocery store

name: friend's house
story: You are at a friends's house, time  for some charades
nav:
Press 
1) go for a party 
2) to go to the movies
3) to go to have some burgers!

name: party
story: You are at a  party having fun with friends. Your friends notice you've got pink eye
nav:
Press 
1) to go home 
2) go back to your friend's house
3) to go to the doctor's office.

name: beach
story: You are at the beach, kick, jump, stomp and splash in the water. A stranger tells you you've got pink eye
nav:
Press 
1) to go back to granny's house
2) to go to see some friends
3) to go to the doctor's office

name: restaurant
story: You are at the restaurant with friends, while you wait for your food,take some photos!
nav:
Press 
1) to go back to work
2) to go home
3) to see a friend

name: grocery store
story: You are at the grocery store, I hope you didn't forget your shopping list.
nav:
Press 
1) to go home 
2) to go to see a friend
3) to go see a movie

name: vet
story: Granny's cat's  got a fever. You are at the Vet.
nav:
Press 
1) to go back to granny's house
2) to go to home and keep the cat with you 
3) to go grab some pet food.

name: pet supplies store
story: You are at the Pet food store.
nav:
Press 
1) to go back to the Vet's
2) to go to home and keep the cat with you
3) to go to granny's house.

name: doctor's office
story: You are at the Doctor's office. You are checked  and you get a prescription medicine from a doctor
nav:
Press 
1)  to go home
2) to go back to a friend's 
3) to go have dinner

name: fast food resturant
story: Time for some burgers and grease!
nav:
Press 
1) to go back to work
2) to go home
3) to go to the movies

name: movies
story: You're at the cinema, about to watch a new Marvel film about adventure.
nav:
Press 
1) to go back home and not act on the idea
2) to go back to your friend's place
3) to the pizza restaurant

name: pizza resturant
story: You are having your fave pizza and enjoying pineapple on it.
nav:
Press
1) to act on the idea and get on a flight 
2) to go home 
3) to have some burgers

name: airport
story: You are  at the airport dressed in sweats and sneakers.
nav:
Press 
1) to grab a snack and stay at the airport for nothing , it is a new country afterall.
2) to visit a lottery retail store
3) to go to a casino

name: lottery retailer
story:
New country and you decided to come to the a lottery store. 
...You just hit a big lottery jackpot! You win!

name: casino
story:
You gambled the night away.
You are stuck in a new country with no money. You lose.
